00018 #ifndef __VOTCA_MD2QM_CUSTOMFIELDS_H
00019 #define __VOTCA_MD2QM_CUSTOMFIELDS_H
00020 
00021 #include <map>
00022 #include <string>
00023 
00024 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00025 
00026 class CustomFields
00027 {
00028 public:
00029     void setDouble(std::string key, double value) { _double_values[key] = value; }
00030     double getDouble(std::string key) { return _double_values[key]; }
00031     std::map<std::string, double> &DoubleValues() { return _double_values; }
00032     bool DoubleExists(std::string key) {
00033    return _double_values.find(key) != _double_values.end();
00034 } 
00035 protected:
00036     std::map<std::string, double> _double_values;
00037 };
00038 
00039 }}
00040 
00041 #endif  /* CUSTOMFIELDS_H */
